TopicTitle: PASSION - A gift to my lovely passion : Astronomy

Articles.Content:
Astronomy is everything for me since I'm a child, today, I want to share a gift for all of this.

Hope you enjoy, 2 months of work.

<iframe width="480" height="270" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/0zx_7OoHezo?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>
I didn't have time to watch most of it, but the launch scene was epic! ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)
A little long and slow in places but overall,,, Just excellent! Should be a trailer for 1.1. Damn good.
